endpoints.description: Receive updated inventory information from the point-of-sale system.
Retrieve the current stock levels and inventory status for all listed products.
Submit a request to restock specific items based on predicted requirements.
Generate a report detailing items that experienced stockouts within a specified timeframe.
Retrieve a list of suggested restocking actions based on analysis of sales trends.
Submit detailed point-of-sale transaction data for inventory analysis.
Access analyzed sales data trends to assist in inventory planning.
Remove a specific item from the inventory tracking system.
Update details of a specific inventory item.
Retrieve detailed information for a specific inventory item.
